item.title: CVE-2021-27781|2024-08-03T21:33:15.792Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20mobile%20%2F%20modern%20client%20management
item.description: The Master operator may be able to embed script tag in HTML with alert pop-up display cookie.

item.title: CVE-2021-27783|2024-08-03T21:33:15.755Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20mobile%20%2F%20modern%20client%20management
item.description: User generated PPKG file for Bulk Enroll may have unencrypted sensitive information exposed.

item.title: CVE-2021-27780|2024-08-03T21:33:15.649Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20mobile%20%2F%20modern%20client%20management
item.description: The software may be vulnerable to both Un-Auth XML interaction and unauthenticated device enrollment.
